column2: "Na ɔsɔfopanyin no bisaa no dɛ
column3: Ana asɛm yi tse dɛm a?"

column2: "Na Stefen see dɛ
column3: Enuanom nye egyanom
column4: hom ntsie: Enyimnyam Nyankopɔn yii noho kyerɛɛ hɛn egya Abraham

column2: "na ɔsee no dɛ
column3: Fi w’asaase do nye w’ebusuafo mu
column4: na bra asaase a mebɛkyerɛ wo no do."

column2: "Nna ofii Kaldeafo asaase no do bɛtsenaa Haran; na n’egya wu ekyir no
column3: Nyankopɔn maa ofii hɔ bɛtsenaa asaase a hom tse do sesei yi do."

column2: "Na ɔamma no egyapadze wɔ mu
column3: nnyɛ anamɔn kor bi mpo; mbom ɔbɔɔ no anohoba dɛ ɔdze bɛma ɔno nye n’asefo a wodzi n’ekyir ma aayɛ hɔndze: naaso nna onnyae nnyaa ba."

column2: "Na mbrɛ Nyankopɔn kae nye dɛ n’asefo bɛyɛ ahɔho wɔ anana asaase do
column3: na wɔdze hɔn ayɛ nkowaa
column4: na wɔayɛ hɔn bɔn mfe ahaanan."

column2: "Na ɔman no a wɔbɔkɔ hɔn mu nkowaasom no
column3: mubobu hɔn atsɛn
column4: Nyankopɔn na ɔse: na n’ekyir no wobefi hɔ na wɔabɔsom me wɔ bea yi mu."

column2: "Na ɔmaa no twatsia ahyɛmudzi no; na ɔdze dɛm woo Isaak
column3: na ne ndaawɔtwe no otwaa no twatsia; na Isaak woo Jakob
column4: na Jakob woo egyanom mpanyin duebien no."

column2: "Na mpanyin duebien no dze enyitan tɔɔn Josef kɔr Egypt; na Nyankopɔn dzii n’ekyir
"na oyii no fiir n’amandzehu nyina mu
column3: na ɔmaa no adom nye nyansa wɔ Farao
column4: Egypthen no
column6: na ɔyɛɛ no otsitsir wɔ Egypt nye ne fie nyina do."

column2: "Na ɔkɔm sii Egypt nyina
column3: nye Keenan
column4: nye amandzehu kɛse

column2: "Na Jakob tsee dɛ edziban wɔ Egypt no
column3: ɔsomaa hɛn egyanom kan."

column2: "Na dza otsia ebien no
column3: Josef yii noho kyerɛɛ no nuanom no
column4: na Farao so bohun Josef n’ebusua no."

column2: "Na Josef somae ma wɔkɛfaa n’egya Jakob nye n’ebusuafo nyina a wɔyɛ nyimpa eduosuon enum no baa ne nkyɛn."
"Na Jakob kɔr Egypt; na ɔno nye hɛn egyanom wuwui;"
"na wɔdze hɔn kɔr Sekem
column3: na wɔdze hɔn kɔtotoo nda a Abraham dze dwɛɛtɛɛ tɔɔ no wɔ Sekem Hamor mba no hɔ no mu."

column2: "Na anohoba a Nyankopɔn kaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ Abraham n’aber rudu no
column3: ɔman no dɔree na wɔyɛɛ pii wɔ Egypt

column2: "dze kodur dɛ Egypthen bi soɛree a onnyim Josef."
"Ɔno na ɔnye hɛn ebusua dzii no yayaayaw
column3: na ɔyɛɛ hɛn egyanom bɔn
column4: na ɔmaa wɔtotoow hɔn nkɔkowaba gui ma wowuwui."

column2: "Na aber no ara mu na wɔwoo Moses
column3: na no ho yɛɛ fɛw wɔ Nyankopɔn enyim; na wɔhwɛɛ no abosoom ebiasa wɔ n’egya fie

column2: "na wɔtoow no kyenee no
column3: Farao babaa kɛfaa no
column4: na ɔtsetsee no dze no yɛɛ ne ba."

column2: "Na wɔdze Egyptfo nyansaa nyina tsetsee Moses
column3: na ɔyɛɛ otumfo wɔ ne nsɛm nye ne ndzeyɛɛ nyina mu."

column2: "Na odzii mfe eduanan no
column3: ɔbaa n’akoma mu dɛ ɔbɔkɔ akɔhwɛ no nuanom Israelmba no."

column2: "Na ohun obi a wɔreyɛ no bɔn no
column3: ɔgyee ne tsir
column4: na ɔtɔɔ nyia wɔrehyɛ no do no no wer kum Egyptnyi no;"

column2: "na osusuu dɛ no nuanom tse ase dɛ Nyankopɔn nam ne nsa do rebɛgye hɔn: naaso wɔanntse ase."
"Na adze kyee no
column3: okopuee no nuanom do dɛ wɔroko
column4: na ɔpɛɛ dɛ ɔka hɔn bɔ mu dɛ
column6: hom yɛ enuanom: ɔyɛ dɛn na hom reyɛ homho bɔn yi?"

column2: "Na nyia ɔreyɛ ne nyɛnko bɔn no suun no dɛ
column3: Woana yɛɛ wo ɔpanyin nye ɔtsɛmbuafo wɔ hɛn do?"

column2: "Epɛ dɛ iku me dɛ mbrɛ ikum Egyptnyi no ndeda no?"
"Na asɛm yi ntsi Moses guanee
column3: na ɔkɛyɛɛ hɔho wɔ Midian asaase do
column4: na ɔwoo mbabanyin beenu wɔ hɔ."

column2: "Na mfe eduanan twaa mu no
column3: Ewuradze bɔfoe yii noho kyerɛɛ no wɔ Sinai kokwaa ho sar no do
column4: wɔ gyaframee a ofi haban bi mu."

column2: "Na Moses hunii no
column3: ɔyɛɛ no nwanwa wɔ n’enyi do
column4: na ɔtwee pinii dɛ ɔrokɔhwɛ no
column8: Abraham nye Isaak nye Jakob hɔn Nyankopɔn. Na Moses ho popoe na oenntum annhwɛ."

column2: "Na Ewuradze see no dɛ
column3: San w’anan mpaboa: na bea a igyina do yi yɛ asaase krɔnkrɔn."

column2: "Ampaara mehu me man a ɔwɔ Egypt hɔn amandzehu
column3: na matse hɔn apempen
column4: na mesian dɛ merebɛgye hɔn: na afei bra ma monsoma wo wɔ Egypt."

column2: "Moses yi ara a wɔpoow no dɛ
column3: Woana na ɔyɛɛ wo ɔpanyin nye ɔtsɛmbuafo wɔ hɛn do no
column4: ɔnoara na Nyankopɔn nam bɔfo a oyii noho kyerɛɛ no haban mu no ne nsa do somaa no dɛ ɔpanyin nye ɔgyefo."

column2: "Oyi na ɔdze hɔn fii Egypt puei
column3: yɛɛ anwanwadze nye asɛnkyerɛdze wɔ Egypt
column4: nye Po Memen mu
column5: nye sar no do mfe eduanan."

column2: "Oyi nye Moses a ɔkaa kyerɛɛ Israelmba no dɛ
column3: Nkɔnhyɛnyi bi na Nyankopɔn bɛma ɔasoɛr ama hom wɔ hom enuanom mu
column4: dɛ mbrɛ ɔmaa me so."

column2: "Oyi na ɔwɔ dɔm a wɔaboa ano wɔ sar no do no mu a ɔnye ɔbɔfo a ɔkasaa kyerɛɛ no wɔ Sinai kokwaa do no nye hɛn egyanom wɔ hɔ
column3: na onyaa nkwasɛm a nkwa wɔ mu dɛ ɔmfa mma hɛn no;"

column2: "na hɛn egyanom ammpɛ dɛ wotsie no
column3: na wosuun no
column4: na wɔdze hɔn akoma sanee kɔr Egypt
column7: Yɛ enyame a wobedzi hɛn enyim ma hɛn
column8: na Moses yi a ɔdze hɛn fii Egypt bae no dze

column2: "Na wɔyɛɛ nantwiba wɔ nda no mu
column3: na wɔbɔɔ afɔr maa honyi no
column4: na wodzii ehurusi wɔ hɔn nsaano edwuma ho."

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn daan n’enyi
column3: na ɔdze hɔn maa dɛ wɔnsom wimu ndzɛmba
column4: dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw wɔ nkɔnhyɛfo nwoma no mu dɛ
column6: aso hom bɔɔ okum afɔr na afɔr horow maa me Mfe eduanan wɔ sar no do?"

column2: "Mbom hom faa Molɔk ntamadan
column3: Nye ɔbosom Refan nworaba
column4: Ehonyi a hom yɛɛ dɛ hom bɔsom hɔn; Na mobɔsoa hom akɔ Babilɔn ekyir noho."

column2: "Hɛn egyanom nyaa adasehyɛ ntamadan no wɔ sar no do
column3: dɛ mbrɛ nyia ɔkasaa kyerɛɛ Moses no hyɛɛ dɛ ɔnyɛ no dɛ mbrɛ nsusudo a ohunii no tse no."

column2: "Ɔno na hɛn egyanom nsa nyae kae no
column3: wɔnye Josua dze baa amanaman a Nyankopɔn paam hɔn fii hɛn egyanom enyim no asaase do. Na ɔtse dɛm dze besi David n’aber do."

column2: "Ɔno na onyaa Nyankopɔn enyim adom
column3: na ɔserɛɛ dɛ wɔmma ɔnhwehwɛ tsenabew mma Jakob Nyankopɔn."

column2: "Na Solomon sii dan maa no."
"Naaso nyia ɔwɔ sorsor no nntsena dza nsa ayɛ mu; dɛ mbrɛ nkɔnhyɛnyi no ka dɛ
column4: "Ɔsor nye m’ahengua
column5: Na asaase nye m’ananadzegua: Ɔdan bɛn na hom besi ama me? Ewuradze na ɔse

column2: "Ana nnyɛ me nsa na ɔyɛɛ yinom nyina?"
"Hom a hom asen hom kɔn a wonntwaa hom twatsia wɔ akoma nye asomu
column3: daa hom siw Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no kwan: dɛ mbrɛ hom egyanom yɛe no
column4: mbrɛ hom so yɛ nye no."

column2: "Nkɔnhyɛfo no mu woana na hom egyanom ennhiahia no ho? Na wokum hɔn a wodzii kan kaa ɔtseneneenyi no ne mbae no; ɔno na hom ayɛ no ho yimafo nye ewudzifo;"
"hom a hom gyee mbra no dɛ abɔfo ahyɛdze
column3: naaso hom enndzi do!"

column2: "Na wɔtsee yinom no
column3: hɔn akoma mu wowɔɔ hɔn
column4: na wɔtwɛɛr hɔn se guu no do."

column2: "Naaso ɔno dze
column3: Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn ahyɛ no ma no
column4: ɔhwɛɛ sor hann
column6: nye Jesus dɛ ogyina Nyankopɔn n’enyimfa
column11: na nyimpa Ba no gyina Nyankopɔn enyimfa."

column2: "Na wɔdze ndze kɛse tseatseaa mu
column3: na wosisiiw hɔn asowa
column4: wɔdze adwenkor kotui hyɛɛ no do;"

column2: "na woyii no edzi fii kurow no mu kesiiw no abo: na adasefo no dze hɔn ntar guu aberantsɛ bi a wɔfrɛ no Saul n’ananadze."
"Na worisiw Stefen abo no
column3: ɔbɔɔ mpaa dɛ
column4: Ewuradze Jesus

column2: "Na obuu ntwɛr
column3: na ɔdze ndze kɛse tseaa mu dɛ
column4: Ewuradze
column5: mma mmfa bɔn yi nnto hɔn do. Na ɔkaa yi no
